title: I’m Going To Live With The Most Beautiful Girl In My Class During Remote Lessons - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Mihagi Sennya   三萩せんや
description:
“…… It’s a secret relationship, right?”

 While the rest of the classmates are taking classes apart, the two of them stand shoulder to shoulder without telling anyone.

 This is a love comedy with a young lady who is very good at taking up invitations to come over and live with you!>
